DESCRIPTION: Only Ammo can be fired. Firing Ammo activates its effect and discards it.
Put a card from your exhaust pile into your hand.
Prevent the next time you would lose HP.
Do not lose Block at the end of the turn.
Shuffle a card into your draw pile.
Discard a card, drawing a new card to replace it.
The next time you take #yAttack damage, deal damage back.
Lose HP. Restore #yFatigued HP at the end of combat.
If this card is Exhausted, its effects activate.
Muddling a card changes its cost to between 0 and 3.
